name: Dirty Dueling in the Dark
description:
This dueling game is best played in underwear alongside your worst enemy in a low lit room to provide the ultimate synthesis of competitive and sexual tension.

Use precision timing and human beyblade techniques to make minced quorn of your foe.

There's a bugfeature where after landing a hit your blade may get stuck in the wall, this is a mini-game where you must wrestle free or risk being wailed upon by your overly competitive friend.

This is a submission for the weekly game jam I went and did in half a dozen hours because my more boring job took up most the week.

Position yourself by using pillars or the ctrl/shift buttons to tactically turn yourself into a mangificent pinwheel.

On a serious note all feedback is appreciated and adored.

Sources

Music - https://freesound.org

Art - https://openclipart.org/detail/139081/muramasa-by-chikiyo

The controls for

Player 1

w - move up

s - move down

a - move left

d - move right

left shift - spin clockwise

left ctrl - spin anti-clockwise

Player 2

up arrow - move up

down arrow - move down

left arrow - move left

right arrow - move right

right shift - spin clockwise

right ctrl - spin anti-clockwise
